name: OOFMAN (Fred the fred)
description:
Your favorite horror game, Slender the eight pages, returns in the form of a Roblox meme ...

Story:

GUEST1882 has reached a very strange forest. And now you will have to get 7 robux to get out. But watch out for OOFMAN, a very dangerous hacker who bans anyone who meets him.

This game have easter eggs, so let's see if you can find them.

Controls:

WSAD - Move

E - Interact

Rigth click - Throw rock/s

Social media:
